blueprint.description: Installs Homebrew (a package management system) on macOS and Linux systems
blueprint.overview: [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/) is a free and open-source software package management system that simplifies the installation of software on Apple's operating system macOS as well as Linux. The name is intended to suggest the idea of building software on the Mac depending on the user's taste.
blueprint.name: Homebrew
blueprint.title: Homebrew
